بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أقر عبد المسيح بن بول الشّمسي المزارع ببلجسوق
أقر إقرار له ø طوع راغب وطالب وأشهد على نفسه في
صحّته وجواز طائعا غير مكره ولا مجبر ولا مضطهد
ولا جاهل بما أقر به فيه أن عليه وعنده
وقبله وفي ذمّته وخالص ماله دينا ثابتا وحقّا
لازما له لزمه من ø الإقرار به لزمزم بن نصر نضر
من القمح الطّيّب الصّل النّصيل السّالم من العلث بالكيل
الـ الدّوّار أربعة أرادب وثلث النّصف من ذلك
إردبّين وسدس يقوم بذلك في صفر صيفة سنة
المذكورة ولذلك وبذلك أقر وأشهد على
نفسه في العشر الثّاني من محرّم سنة سبع وعشرين وخمسمائة
وحضر سربام بولس وأشهد على نفسه بينهما
وبــذلك أقر وأشهد على نفوسهم
في التّأريخ المذكور شهدت عليهم بذلك وكتب
إسمعيل بن زيد بن أحمد بن عبد اللّه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ʾaqarra ʿabdu ăl masīḥi bnu būla ăš šamsiyyi šumsiyyi ăl muzāriʿu bi bulǧusūqa
ʾaqarra ʾiqrār la ø hu ø ṭawʿ rāġib wa ṭālib wa ʾašhada ʿalà nafsi hi fī
ṣiḥḥaẗi hi wa ǧawāz:in ṭāʾiʿ:an ġayra mukrah:in wa lā muǧbar:in wa lā muḍṭahad:in
wa lā ǧāhil:in bi mā ʾaqarra bi hi fī hi ʾanna ʿalay hi wa ʿinda hu
wa qibala hu wa fī ḏimmaẗi hi wa ḫāliṣi māli hi dayn:an ṯābit:an wa ḥaqq:an
lāzim:an la lazima hu mina ø ăl ʾiqrāri ʾiqrāru bi hi li zamzama bni naṣar:in naḍr:in naṣr:in
mina ăl qamḥi ăṭ ṭayyibi ăṣ ăn ṣalli naṣīli ăs sālimi mina ăl ʿalaṯi bi ăl kayli
ăl ăd **** dawwāri ʾarbaʿaẗa ʾarādiba wa ṯulṯ:uni ăn niṣfu min ḏālika
ʾirdabbayni wa suds:un yaqūmu bi ḏālika fī ṣafar:in ṣayfaẗi sanaẗa sanaẗi

nafsi hi fī ăl ʿašri ăṯ ṯānī min muḥarram:in sanaẗa sabʿ:in wa ʿišrīna wa ḫamsi miʾaẗ:in

*********** wa bi ḏālika ʾaqarra wa ʾašhada ʿalà nufūsi him
fī ăt taʾrīḫi ăl maḏkūri šahidtu ʿalay him bi ḏālika wa kataba
ʾismāʿīlu bnu zaydi bni ʾaḥmada bni ʿabdi ăl lāhi

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ʿAbd al-Masīḥ b. Bûl aš-Šamsī, the farmer in Bulǧusûq, has acknowledged, (viz.)
he has acknowledged for him(self) voluntarily, desiring and demanding (it) and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation, he being
sound and capable of transacting, voluntarily, without compulsion and not against his will and not under constraint,
and not ignorant of what he has acknowledged herein, viz. that he owes, has in his possession,
is in debt and under obligation for, with his undiminished property, as an obligatory debt and an obligation
incumbent upon him on the basis of the acknowledgment thereto, to Zamzam b. Naṣr
of good, cleansed wheat, free from any admixture, according to the .................. measure
four artabas and the third (of an artaba) - the half thereof being
two artabas and a sixth (of an artaba) - with which he will present himself in Ṣafar of the ...............
afore-mentioned year. And thereto he has acknowledged and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation
in the second decade of Muḥarram of the year five hundred and twenty seven.
Sarabâm Bûlus has been present and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation before them
.................. and there(to) they have acknowledged and have called witnesses to testify to their obligation
on the above mentioned date. I have testified thereto for them and
Ismaʿîl b. Zaid b. Aḥmad b. ʿAbdallâh has written (it).
